author: Katy Steinmetz
title: You’ve Tested Positive for COVID-19. Who Has a Right to Know?
description: Privacy concerns must be balanced with the need to protect others, but the equation is affected by individual variables.
content:
A novel social ritual is emerging along with the novel coronavirus: sharing the news that one has COVID-19.
Actor Tom Hanks did it on Twitter with folksy fatalism and a promise that he and his wife, actor Rita Wilson, who also tested positive, would follow t… [+10484 chars]
